subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: The star striker Diego Costa was carried off with a bloody leg after scoring Atlético Madrid’s second goal in a 2-0 victory at 10-man Getafe, but the team said he was not seriously injured.
snippet: The star striker Diego Costa was carried off with a bloody leg after scoring Atlético Madrid’s second goal in a 2-0 victory at 10-man Getafe, but the team said he was not seriously injured.
